describe: Highly self-motivated and goal-oriented professional committed to pursuing a long-term career in web design. Offers a 10-year record of accomplishment that demonstrates strong analytical skills and problem solving expertise, compute platform proficiency, and great success with projects from ideation to completion. Owns a reputation for consistently exceeding client expectations for sophisticated web site development and functionality along with content management and precise theme creation.

works.describe: API design standards, patterns and best-practices especially Microservices • Knowledge of authentication, authorization of services via OAuth 2 • Test Junit, SOAPUI, Selenium, Cucumber, Postman • Java, Spring/Spring Boot, Hibernate • Relational and/or non-relational databases • JavaScript (NodeJS, ReactJS, AngularJS, Ionic), HTML5, CSS3 • CI/CD tools Jenkins, Maven, Jira, BitBucket • Experience working with agile methodologies (Scrum)
